sources.title: Space Master X-7
sources.description: Title: Space Master X-7 Summary: A fungus brought from space threatens to grow and spread, devouring everyone in its path. Directed by: Edward Bernds Actors: Bill Williams, Lyn Thomas, Robert Ellis Production Company: Regal Films Release Date: June 1958 (USA) Aspect Ratio: 2.35 : 1 A space probe returns to Earth covered with a strange fungus. The fungus is accidentally tinged with human blood and is transformed into an ever-growing pile of space rust, dubbed "Blood Rust". It is up to John Hand and Joe Rattigan to find the one woman who can stop the rust from spreading and taking over the world.

metadata.Plot: A space probe returns to Earth covered with a strange fungus. The fungus is accidentally tinged with human blood and is transformed into an ever-growing pile of space rust, dubbed "Blood Rust". It is up to John Hand and Joe Rattigan to find the one woman who can stop the rust from spreading and taking over the world.
metadata.Writer: George Worthing Yates, Daniel Mainwaring, Edward Bernds
metadata.Actors: Bill Williams, Lyn Thomas, Robert Ellis
